medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Congenital hypothyroidism was detected on neonatal screening. The duration of symptoms is not specified, but the child was reexamined at age 4 and did not show other abnormalities or symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The child has a PAX8 Q40P mutation. The mother has mild, adult-onset autoimmune hypothyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: The mother is heterozygous for the same PAX8 mutation but has a normally sized thyroid gland and no symptoms of hypothyroidism until adult-onset.
